SEARCH

Class Sidebar

java.lang.Object
Sidebar
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class Sidebar extends Object implements ActionListener
This sidebar is loaded with every Manager-level page. The button for the currently selected page is tracked and disabled. The sidebar also handles moving between pages.
Author:
Elliot Michlin
